PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-15272012-11-22,  ,  CH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ERIC HUGHES of Calgary, Alberta, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
